en-US.summary: Say the color bands of a resistor and Alexa will tell you its resistance.
en-US.name: Resistor Value - Find resistance from color bands
en-US.description:
Now you can ask Alexa to find the resistance of a resistor. Open the skill and just say the three colors or four colors including the tolerance band.

Currently only four band resistors are supported.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
1) Open the skill "Alexa, open resistor value".
The skill should respond with a welcome message.

2) Once skill is open, say three resistor color bands
Ex: 
Brown black blue
orange orange black
The skill should respond with correct resistor value.

3) You can also say 4 colors, for which the skill should return the resistance as well as tolerance.
(silver and gold are the only accepted 4th color)
Ex: 
orange orange black gold
brown black blue silver

4) For one shot questions you can ask
"Alexa, ask resistor value brown brown red gold"
